description: Windows is the most popular PC operating system among developers using PCs in Eastern Visayas. While Linux distros are also used, they are only mainly used by professionals. No student have reported that they use any PC OS outside of Windows.

All: An Ubuntu-based distro (e.g. Pop! OS, Linux Mint, elementaryOS)
Professionals/Freelancers: An Ubuntu-based distro (e.g. Pop! OS, Linux Mint, elementaryOS)
